channel.title: Need help/with custom items so i posted here(no resonse in help section)
channel.description: k i made this sword FROM SCRATCH i didn't leech from anything if you can find one weapon that looks like mine plz do so and say i leeched but im positive i didn't. ok this is my first custom item and when i log in i added the models(correctly)but when i log in..its just some sort of object like a crate im walking on.Another thing is, no priorities showed up so i just made it 10 like a tut said. In game: [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/v830k7.jpg[/img] Heres my class8: [code] if(i == 15353) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12151; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 12152;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 12152;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Zamorak longsword";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Zamorak's longsword.".getBytes();//examin info }[/code] and heres the picture of the sword: Wield model: [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/344turl.jpg[/img] Drop model: [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2vkmhw6.jpg[/img] Question tho uhm...You just make up a number between like 14000-14500 right?cuz i just made up a number for the model that wasn't used and put it in my class8 and added that model.

item.title: Need help/with custom items so i posted here(no resonse in help section)
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

change the models ids in your ints, lemme show you where. class8.anInt174 = 12151; //Model ID // 20233 change the 12151 to what you model is in your models folder
i tryed that it was 12151 lol

Read full topic
item.source: Need help/with custom items so i posted here(no resonse in help section)

item.title: Need help/with custom items so i posted here(no resonse in help section)
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“xray veeo, post:8, topic:245278”][quote author=lesterknome link=topic=321700.msg2545176#msg2545176 date=1227233109]
figured out what it is, ill tell you if you remove m.dog from your list.
[/quote]
Tell me how and you and m.dog will be off the list.[/quote]
change the models ids in your ints, lemme show you where.
class8.anInt174 = 12151; //Model ID // 20233
change the 12151 to what you model is in your models folder

Read full topic

item.title: Need help/with custom items so i posted here(no resonse in help section)
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

ok ok ok…ill tell the truth IT IS NOT A BOWSWORD but i compared them and they looked alike…it is actually a recolored slender blade and the blade was bent more and a different handle…notice the square before the blade is the same as the slender blade.

Read full topic

lol so…because i posted 1 month ago and didn’t get a reply so i posted here and GOT a reply you add me to your faggot list??sorry asshole but i like my questions answered…

item.title: Need help/with custom items so i posted here(no resonse in help section)
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

k i made this sword FROM SCRATCH i didn’t leech from anything if you can find one weapon that looks like mine plz do so and say i leeched but im positive i didn’t.
ok this is my first custom item and when i log in i added the models(correctly)but when i log in…its just some sort of object like a crate im walking on.Another thing is, no priorities showed up so i just made it 10 like a tut said.
In game:

v830k7.jpg774×531

Heres my class8:

if(i == 15353) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12151; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 12152;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 12152;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Zamorak longsword";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Zamorak's longsword.".getBytes();//examin info }
and heres the picture of the sword:
Wield model:

344turl.jpg862×651

Drop model:
2vkmhw6.jpg862×651

Question tho uhm…You just make up a number between like 14000-14500 right?cuz i just made up a number for the model that wasn’t used and put it in my class8 and added that model.

Read full topic
